name: Magic Nations
description: Jump into a fantasy world of the Magic Nations, a free-to-play turn-based strategy card battle game. Grab your card deck and fight against opponents from all over the world. The gameplay is based on tactics and adapting your game to battlefield conditions. Collect, sell, expand.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows x64 Memory: 2 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows x64 Memory: 4 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
